channel.title: Pope Leo XIV on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Pope Leo XIV on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Madonna Urges Pope Leo to Go to Gaza: “There Is No More Time”
item.description: The pop icon said the pontiff was “the only one of us who cannot be denied entry” into the territory.
